title: 142. The Troubled Cremation of Stevie the Cat
description: We spend billions on our pets, and one of the fastest-growing costs is pet "aftercare." But are those cremated remains you got back really from your pet?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
